info.title: BlueMSX-Wii
info.author: Tim Brugman
info.details:
BlueMSX ported to Wii with game selection GUI.
On first start an MSX directory will be created in the root of your SD-Card with all necessary files.
A basic gamepack can also be installed automatically, for a full gamepack visit our website http://www.wiimsx.com.
Games can easily be added to the MSX/Games folder by editing .xml files, see guides on our website.
